Overall I rate this movie a 3, it is just the same Michael Bay thing with a typical story line.  Too much slow motion and the new girl is a very terrible actress. For the sake of wanting to watch cool explosions, this screen doesn't do it justice, but if you can't afford the theaters, then this is the best for now. And thank you uploader for providing this. OK FOR ALL THE DIFFERENT COMMENTS SAYING THIS AND THAT, ILL STRAIGHTEN IT ALL OUT:
1. My personal A/V rating is(0 is blank screen and 10 is DVD quality) 6/8. Great video quality, however the audio rises and lowers a couple times throughout and you can hear someone coughing and someone messing with the cam. Not complaining though.

2. There is what im assuming is about a 20 minute gap missing in the final hour, doesn't seem to mess with the overall story, but it is missing. This DL is 132 minutes while the imdb.com/ runtime is 154.

3. Overall I CANNOT complain about this torrent. Amazing video and great audio. Sure there are some blips here and there, but this is free...if you want to complain that bad, go spend 10 bucks to see it in a cinema.
